title: Rough handdrawn slanted typeface
content:
Hi there. I'm looking for this font attached here.  
Any ideas?

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-11-24 at 10.04.30 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141126165224/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-11-24%20at%2010.04.30%20AM.png) | 168.26 KB |
author: bjornfloki

comments.content:
I've had no luck finding a match; only found one typeface with a similar |W|, but it’s neither condensed nor italic:

[http://www.dafont.com/monday-morning.font?text=THEY+WANT+MY+SOUL](http://web.archive.org/web/20141126165224/http:/www.dafont.com/monday-morning.font?text=THEY+WANT+MY+SOUL "http://www.dafont.com/monday-morning.font?text=THEY+WANT+MY+SOUL")
Not a good sample. Judging by the swo different |T|s, it could well be handwritten.
